attachments.title: Deployment #51
attachments.text: Build #258 is being deplayed for <https://github.com/myorg/myrep|myorg/myrep>. There have been <https://github.com/myorg/myrep/compare/{4}...{5}|15 commits> over 6 closed pull requests:

fields.title: refactor skeleton store tool so domain doesn't need to be set
fields.value: <https://github.com/myorg/myrep/pull/804|#804: refactor skeleton store tool so domain doesn't need to be set> by andyshinn

fields.title: implement age limit on feed file used by scrapeless stores
create laundry store class and flow file to copy catalog file to gcp
Localization fix: Removed double instance check of language, fixed indentation
